lead_paragraph: Parole was denied today for Sirhan B. Sirhan, who is serving a life sentence for the murder of Senator Robert F. Kennedy almost a quarter of a century ago. "This type of crime is a great threat to the values, mores and laws of the nation," said Jim Nielsen, the chairman of a three-member panel of the Board of Prison Terms that denied the inmate's parole request.

headline.main: California Denies Parole Request by Sirhan
